ValidationRule.description: JSH - Deactivating because there are individual validation rules that do the same exact thing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(1 of 12) Sales Rep Conducting Needs Analysis") && RecordTypeId = "01270000000UQ53" && OR( ISBLANK( Payroll_Conversion_Target_Date__c ) , ISBLANK(Text( What_Platform__c )), ISNULL( Estimated_Paychex_Revenue__c ) , ISBLANK( Number_of_Active_EEs__c ) , ISBLANK( Sales_Representative__c ) , ISBLANK( DSM__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Conversion Target Date,What Platform?,Estimated Paychex Revenue,Number of Active Ees,Sales Representative,DSM These fields are required field.
